virtual-sensor.name: cimisJsonHourlyEtAtNoon
virtual-sensor.description: Virtual sensor for CIMIS api. It records hourly reading at noon for the previous day. Needs the CIMIS API key below

source.query: select _____data__providers__12____owner as provider , _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlyrelhum__value as hlyrelhum , _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlyvappres__value as hlyvappres, _____data__providers__12____records__12____hour as hour , _____data__providers__12____records__12____standard as standard, _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlywinddir__value as hlywinddir , _____data__providers__12____records__12____date as date , _____data__providers__12____records__12____station as station , _____data__providers__12____records__12____scope as scope, _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlyairtmp__value as hlyairtmp, _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlydewpnt__value as hlydewpnt, _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlyprecip__value as hlyprecip , _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlywindspd__value as hlywindspd , _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlyreswind__value as hlyreswind , _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlysolrad__value as hlysolrad , _____data__providers__12____records__12____hlysoiltmp__value as hlysoiltmp , _____data__providers__12____records__12____julian as julian , _____data__providers__12____records__12____zipcodes as zipcodes from wrapper
